[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@jsplumb/browser-ui-lists](./browser-ui-lists.md) &gt; [JsPlumbList](./browser-ui-lists.jsplumblist.md) &gt; [newConnection](./browser-ui-lists.jsplumblist.newconnection.md)

## JsPlumbList.newConnection() method

Notification that a new connection concerning this list has been added. This is not a method that should be called as part of the public API; it is for the list manager to call.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
newConnection(c: Connection, el: jsPlumbDOMElement, index: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  c | Connection | New connection |
|  el | jsPlumbDOMElement | The element which is either the source or target of the connection |
|  index | number | 0 if the element is connection source, 1 if it is connection target. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
